name: icons-font
description: This is the official schoox icons font. These are the extracted files from iconmoon service. The purpose of this repo is to track/log the icons font and upload it during the building process to S3

scripts.build: npm run design-system && npm run minify && npm run build-tokens && node index.js
scripts.minify: minify schoox/style.css > schoox/.style.css && minify design-system/main.css > design-system/main.min.css
